name: canva_search_elements
description: Search for design elements (icons, illustrations, photos, graphics) on Canva. Returns up to 15 results with element type, preview image, and URL.

steps.code: const results = []; const seen = new Set(); const allLinks = document.querySelectorAll('main a[href], [role="list"] a[href]'); for (let i = 0; i < allLinks.length && results.length < 15; i++) { const el = allLinks[i]; const href = el.href || ''; if (!href || seen.has(href) || href === window.location.href) continue; seen.add(href); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); if (!imgEl) continue; const ariaLabel = el.getAttribute('aria-label') || ''; const alt = imgEl.getAttribute('alt') || ''; const proEl = el.querySelector('[aria-label*="Pro"], [aria-label*="premium"]'); results.push({ title: ariaLabel || alt, is_premium: !!proEl, image: imgEl.getAttribute('src') || '', url: href }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || `{{query}}`, element_type: window.location.pathname.split('/search/')[1] || `{{element_type}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract element results
